entry.desc: Name of file containing grid specification (a)Name of file containing grid specification
Name of file containing initial conditions, that is either a valid restart file or 'inicon.nc' if climatological based initial conditions are desired.

how often to start a new file in days
netcdf format (valid arguments are 0 for classic, 1 for 64-bit offset and 2 for netcdf4/hdf5 format)

'File name (incl. full path) for iron (dust) deposition data'
File name (incl. full path) for swa climatology field (needed if bromoform scheme is activated)
Logical switch to activate riverine input
File name (incl. full path) for riverine input data

Switch to couple nitrogen deposition. Requires do_ndep.
Switch to couple N2O and NH3 fluxes
Switch for cyano-bluefix in euphotic zone only
Logical switch to activate ocean alkalinization, for expert users only, further options are set in the namelist group bgcoafx

Number of subcyles per time-step for sediment spinup
Filename (incl. full path) to DIC initial values

Filename (incl. full path) to delta 14C initial values (used if C-isotope code is activated)
Assume pH dependency of DMS production if set to .true.
File name (incl. full path) for surface PI pH input data (needed if with_dmsph=.true.)
File name (incl. full path) for sediment porosity
Determines provenance of atmospheric CO2 for gas flux computation.
Use POC sinking scheme with increasing sinking velocity with depth
NOTE: HAMOCC bromoform scheme currently only supported on the tnx1v4 grid (no swa-climatology has been created for other grid configurations)
activate the HAMOCC carbon isotope code
Use aggregation scheme for sinking of particles
Full path of the input file for the alkalinization scenario 'file'
Pmol alkalinity/yr added in 'const' or 'ramp' scenarios

Min latitude where alkalinity is added in 'const' or 'ramp' scenarios

End year for ramp up in 'ramp' scenario
OmegaA threshold for application of OA, negative = no threshold
phytoplankton parameter: kmol/m3 - i.e. 0.04 mmol P/m3 half saturation constant
phytoplankton parameter: 1/d - nitrogen fixation rate by blue green algae (cyanobacteria)
zooplankton parameter: kmol/m3 - i.e. 0.08 mmol P/m3 half saturation constant
zooplankton parameter: fraction of mortality as PO_4
zooplankton parameter: dimensionless fraction -fraction of grazing egested
shell production parameter: kmol/m3 - i.e. 4.0 mmol Si/m3 half saturation constant
shell production parameter: calcium carbonate to organic phosphorous production ratio
remineralization and dissolution parameter: 1/d -remineralization rate (of DOM)
remineralization and dissolution parameter: 1/d Aerob remineralization rate detritus

remineralization and dissolution parameter: 1/d Remineralization rate for sulphate reduction
Dust deposition and iron solubility parameter: factor introduced to tune deposition/solubility

Sinking parameter: m/d Sinking speed of opal iris : 60

Sinking parameter: m/d maximum sinking speed
